snippet: City Room offers a sampling of views from more than 1,000 online comments on The Journal News's efforts to present handgun permit information online.

headline.main: Readers Divided on News Site's Map of Gun Permit Holders
headline.print_headline: Publishing of Gun Data Elicits Strong Opinions
